comments:
Build ID: M20071023-1652

Steps To Reproduce:
1. (Prefs,General,Network Connections) Set a manual proxy configuration and remove all "No Proxy for" hosts.
2. Apply, restart Eclipse
3. (Prefs,General,Network Connections) Select "Direct connection to the Internet", Apply.
4.  (Prefs,General,Network Connections) Select again a manual proxy configuration, Apply.
5. org.eclipse.core.runtime.AssertionFailedException occurs


More information:
Stack trace:

org.eclipse.core.runtime.AssertionFailedException: assertion failed: 
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Assert.isTrue(Assert.java:109)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Assert.isTrue(Assert.java:95)

	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.sendEvent(Widget.java:938)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.runDeferredEvents(Display.java:3682)

The problem seems to be that the deserialized information from the persisted preferences is actually null in case of an empty "non-proxy list". Hence, the assertion in org.eclipse.core.internal.net.ProxyManager.setNonProxiedHosts(ProxyManager.java:111) fails. 

Is a minor issue but might cause other problems as well.
